item.title: Social Treaty: Hungarian Drinking Culture Constraint
item.description:
Social Treaty: Hungarian Drinking Culture Constraint

Summary: Persistent social pressure (‘No pálinka?’). Enforced personal treaty: beer/wine only, 1–2 shots max.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batch 4

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
